alert.note: Alert for Buckeye, Avondale; Gila Bend; Northwest Pinal County; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; Tonopah Desert; West Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 4:51PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 545 PM MST... At 450 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorms near Estrella Sailport, or 18 miles southeast of Goodyear, as well as along Interstate 8 between Casa Grande and Gila Bend. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Avondale, Goodyear, Gila Bend, Maricopa, Estrella, Big Horn, Bosque, Cotton Center, Freeman, Estrella Sailport, Sonoran National Monument, Mobile, Rainbow Valley, Stanfield, and Ak-Chin Village. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 120 and 168. AZ Route 238 between mile markers 2 and 44. AZ Route 85 between mile markers 124 and 136. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Phoenix.

area.areaDesc: Buckeye, Avondale; Gila Bend; Northwest Pinal County; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; Tonopah Desert; West Pinal County
